    Topic Modelling with Bertopic

    Function reference

    All functions

    bt_fit_transform_model()
    fit a bertopic model to cleaned data
    bt_make_df()
    make a df combining bertopic output with columns in original data export
    bt_viz_diff_terms
    Function to find terms with the greatest difference between topics
    bt_viz_top_terms()
    create top terms charts for topic modelling completed using bertopic
    check_python_dependencies()
    Check that dependencies are loaded
    install_python_dependencies()
    Install Python Dependencies
